title: Hexes
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

**Hexes** are spells that affect things and monsters (usually negatively). They mostly ignore dealing direct damage in favour of inflicting debilitating status effects on enemies. Many effects are resisted by [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"), which can be reduced by a [scroll of vulnerability](/Scroll_of_vulnerability "Scroll of vulnerability") or an [orb](/Orb "Orb") of [guile](/Guile "Guile").

## History

- [0.28](/0.28 "0.28") Added [Enfeeble](/Enfeeble "Enfeeble") and [Anguish](/Anguish "Anguish"). [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility") now monster only.
- [0.20](/0.20 "0.20") Moved [Portal Projectile](/Portal_Projectile "Portal Projectile") into this school and moved [Gell's Gravitas](/Gell%27s_Gravitas "Gell's Gravitas") out of it.
- [0.18](/0.18 "0.18") The level 5 spell [Yara's Violent Unravelling](/Yara%27s_Violent_Unravelling "Yara's Violent Unravelling") was added to the Book of Hinderance and it was renamed to [Book of Misfortune](/Book_of_Misfortune "Book of Misfortune").
- [0.17](/0.17 "0.17") [Sure Blade](/Sure_Blade "Sure Blade") and [Enslavement](/Enslavement "Enslavement") were removed. [Darkness](/Darkness "Darkness") was set to level 6 instead of level 7! Gell's Gravitas became level 3 and smite-targeted, but no longer confusing enemies. Silence was now inside [Book of Dreams](/Book_of_Dreams "Book of Dreams"). [Metabolic Englaciation](/Metabolic_Englaciation "Metabolic Englaciation") was set to level 5.
- [0.16](/0.16 "0.16") [Gell's Gravitas](/Gell%27s_Gravitas "Gell's Gravitas") was added.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), you could find [Polymorph](/Polymorph "Polymorph") in the [Book of Transfigurations](/Book_of_Transfigurations "Book of Transfigurations"). It caused an effect similar to a wand of polymorph.
- In [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"), the [Enchantments](/Enchantments "Enchantments") school was split in order to create Hexes and [Charms](/Charms "Charms").

'''Hexes''' are spells that affect things and monsters (usually negatively). They mostly ignore dealing direct damage in favour of inflicting debilitating status effects on enemies. Many effects are resisted by [[willpower]], which can be reduced by a [[scroll of vulnerability]] or an [[orb]] of [[guile]].

==History==
*[[0.28]] Added [[Enfeeble]] and [[Anguish]]. [[Invisibility]] now monster only.
*[[0.20]] Moved [[Portal Projectile]] into this school and moved [[Gell's Gravitas]] out of it.
*[[0.18]] The level 5 spell [[Yara's Violent Unravelling]] was added to the Book of Hinderance and it was renamed to [[Book of Misfortune]].
*[[0.17]] [[Sure Blade]] and [[Enslavement]] were removed. [[Darkness]] was set to level 6 instead of level 7! Gell's Gravitas became level 3 and smite-targeted, but no longer confusing enemies. Silence was now inside [[Book of Dreams]]. [[Metabolic Englaciation]] was set to level 5.
*[[0.16]] [[Gell's Gravitas]] was added.
*Prior to [[0.14]], you could find [[Polymorph]] in the [[Book of Transfigurations]]. It caused an effect similar to a wand of polymorph.
*In [[0.8]], the [[Enchantments]] school was split in order to create Hexes and [[Charms]].
